column5: I cant seem to get any of the links when I click on them I just get a pop sound like when someone has something for sale i cant connect to the http to get the pictures what do I need to do Thanks
I have the same problem here.But Ive found if I hold ctrl down while clicling on the link,it SOMETIMES works!  Believe me when I say, I'm the King Klutz where 'Puters are concerned.

sounds like your pop up blocker is blocking the links. there should be a yellowish banner that appears when you here the pop sound at the top of your explorer window. it will say temporarily allow pop ups, click it, page will refresh and the link should now work. you'll have to do that everytime unless you turn off the blocker all together, but that will leave you vulnerable .
THE holoding down of the ctrl seem to work thanks guys
